document_data.name: Rubber
document_data.mainbody: '''Rubber''' was a substance derived from [[rubber tree]]s.

Applications.Apparel:
Rubber was used to fashion [[Mask (object)|masks]] and curvy [[corset]]s.{{Cite web/Ladies Night at the Yawning Portal}} At the [[Baths (Arabel)|Baths]] in [[Arabel]], hedonistic revelries sometimes included pink rubber [[dragon]] costumes.

In Waterdeep, rubber [[boots]] were not unheard of as part of a miner's outfit.
Applications.Magic:
Rubber served as a [[material component]] in several [[spell]]s, including ''[[afterclap]]'', ''[[deadly dance]]'', ''[[erase]]'', ''[[false face]]'', ''[[insulation]]'' ''[[lightning shield]]'',{{Cite dragon/203/Arcane Lore: The Blue Books of Othyisar Du'Morde|36}} ''[[sacrosanct]]'', ''[[tentacle of withering]]'', and ''[[translocation shift]]''.{{Cite dragon/219/The Wizards Three: Warmer Than Expected|97-98}}

Some versions of the ''[[wand of wonder]]'' could conjure hundreds of permanent rubber balls that rained down around the wielder.

document_data.Production:
Rubber was produced using the congealed snd cured sap of the rubber tree.{{Cite dragon/97/Pages from the Mages IV|31}} This sap was melted and molded into usable shapes or sculpted into objects.

Rubber was known and used in Faer没n since at least the time of ancient [[Netheril]]. and was cultivated as an agricultural product by the tribes of Malatra. Rubber was also imported to Faer没n from Maztica.
